mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT MAC_NAME FROM MACHINE WHERE PRD.MAC_CODE = MAC_CODE) MAC_NAME ,(SELECT PRC_NAME FROM PROCESS WHERE PRD.PRC_CODE = PRC_CODE) PRC_NAME ,(SELECT ITM_NAME FROM ITEM WHERE PR.ITM_CODE = ITM_CODE) ITM_NAME , PRD.PRC_COM_D_VOL , PRD.PRC_RES_VOL , PRD.PRC_ERR_VOL FROM PROCESS_RESULT_D PRD, PROCESS_RESULT PR WHERE PRD.MOV_NUM = PR.MOV_NUM AND PRC_STATE = '진행' AND PRC_STR_TIME IS NOT NULL AND PRC_END_TIME IS NULL
